ANU.name: Michael Cardew Hall
expertise: Records And Information Management Excl. Business Records And Information Management
Decision Support And Group Support Systems
Manufacturing Processes And Technologies Excl. Textiles
ANU.biography: Professor Cardew-Hall has held the position of Head Department of Engineering, Deputy Dean, and Acting Dean of the College of Engineering and Computer Science at the Australian National University.
